properties.description: linked service for adls for covid project
linked service for blob storage connection for covid project
linked service for getting covid data from github
linked service for getting data from ecdc site

transformations.name: select1
transformations.description: select columns 'country, country_code, population, indicator, daily_count, date, source'

transformations.name: selectReqColAtEnd
transformations.description: selectReqColAtEnd with columns 'country, country_code, population, source, reported_date, country_special, confirmed cases_count, deaths_count, country_code_2_digit, country_code_3_digit, continent'

transformations.name: selectReqFields
transformations.description: selectReqFields with columns 'country, indicator, reported_date, reported_year_week, value, source'

scriptLines: selectReqCountryHospitalFields split(indicator == 'Weekly new hospital admissions per 100k' || indicator == 'Weekly new ICU admissions per 100k',
pivotBy(indicator, ['Weekly new hospital admissions per 100k', 'Weekly new ICU admissions per 100k']),
